title: Stefano Garzon
text:
Stefano Garzon (born December 23, 1981 in <a href="Cerea">Cerea</a>) is an Italian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player currently playing for <a href="Lecco%20Calcio">Lecco Calcio</a>.
Career.
He made his <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> debut on November 12, 2006 for <a href="A.C.%20ChievoVerona">A.C. ChievoVerona</a> in a game against <a href="U.C.%20Sampdoria">U.C. Sampdoria</a> when he came on as a substitute in the 82nd minute for <a href="Paolo%20Sammarco">Paolo Sammarco</a>.
In January 2008 he left for Verona on loan and in summer 2008 Verona bought half of the registration rights. In June 2009 he deal became permanent.
